TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TypeDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供有关组件特征的信息，如组件的特性、属性和事件。

span.span: Provides information about the characteristics for a component, such as its attributes, properties, and events.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 提供了两种方法可以访问的类型的元数据： 在系统提供的 API 的反射命名空间，和类。The .NET Framework provides two ways to access metadata on a type: the reflection API provided in the namespace, and the class. 反射是适用于所有类型的通用机制，因为其 foundation 建立在方法的根类。Reflection is a general mechanism available to all types because its foundation is established in the method of the root class. 在于不能修改它的目标类型的编译完成后，是不可扩展的它将返回为某一类型的信息。The information it returns for a type is not extensible, in that it cannot be modified after compilation of the target type. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的主题[反射](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md). 与此相反，是组件用于可扩展检查机制： 那些类，该实现接口。In contrast, is an extensible inspection mechanism for components: those classes that implement the interface. 与不同的是反射，它并不检查方法。Unlike reflection, it does not inspect for methods. 通过目标组件通过提供的多个服务可以动态扩展。 can be dynamically extended by several services available through the target component's . 下表显示了这些服务。The following table shows these services. |服务名称Service name|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||使另一个类，如、 提供给组件的额外属性。Enables another class, such as , to provide extra properties to a component.| ||使另一个对象以修改由组件公开的标准元数据。Enables another object to modify the standard metadata that is exposed by a component.| ||支持的一类用于完全且动态地指定其自己的元数据，替换的标准检查机制。Enables a class to completely and dynamically specify its own metadata, replacing the standard inspection mechanism of .| 提供的扩展性允许不同于其实际运行时表示形式，它使组件的设计时表示用于构建设计时基础结构。The extensibility provided by allows the design-time representation of a component to differ from its actual run-time representation, which makes useful for building design-time infrastructure. 中的所有方法是`static`。All the methods in are `static`. 无法创建此类的实例，不能继承此类。You cannot create an instance of this class, and this class cannot be inherited. 你可以设置属性和事件值两种不同方式： 在组件类中指定它们，或在设计时更改它们。You can set property and event values two different ways: specify them in the component class or change them at design time. 因为你可以设置这些值的重载方法的两种方式采用两种不同类型的参数： 类类型或对象实例。Because you can set these values two ways, the overloaded methods of take two different types of parameters: a class type or an object instance. 如果想要访问信息，而且您有对象的实例，使用的组件调用的方法。When you want to access information and you have an instance of the object, use the method that calls for a component. 使用仅在没有对象的实例时，为类类型调用方法。Use the method that calls for the class type only when you do not have an instance of the object. 通过缓存属性和事件的速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果出现这种情况，则必须调用方法以更新缓存。If this is the case, then the method must be called to update the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法向组件的指定实例添加类级别属性。The method adds class-level attributes to the specified instance of a component. 因为这是使用应用程序的一个常见要求[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]Windows 窗体设计器和属性窗口中，此方法提供一种快捷方式： 创建合并提供的属性与属性的类型说明提供程序已存在的类。Because this is a common requirement of applications using the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] Windows Forms Designer and Properties window, this method provides a shortcut by creating a type description provider that merges the provided attributes with the attributes that already exist on the class. 返回值是用于添加特性的类型说明提供。The return value is the type description provider that was used to add the attributes. 此提供程序更高版本可以传递给方法时不再需要添加的属性。This provider can later be passed to the method when the added attributes are no longer needed.

summary.span: 为给定的编辑器基类型添加编辑器表。

span.span: Adds an editor table for the given editor base type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加编辑器表对于给定的编辑器基类型。The method adds an editor table for the given editor base type. 通常情况下，编辑器指定为在组件上的元数据。Typically, editors are specified as metadata on a component. 但是，如果没有元数据请求的编辑器基类型可以找到该组件上，关联如果可以找到一个将搜索编辑器类型，编辑器表。However, if no metadata for a requested editor base type can be found on the component, the associated will search an editor table for the editor type, if one can be found. 到类型描述符添加编辑器表后, 它不能删除，并拥有的类型描述符。Once an editor table has been added to a type descriptor, it cannot be removed and is owned by the type descriptor. 类型描述符自由地可能会使对此表进行修改。The type descriptor may freely make modifications to this table. 编辑器表的格式使用的数据类型作为键，使用编辑器作为值。The format for an editor table uses data types as keys and editors as values. 表中的条目的值部分表示的编辑器实例。The value portion of an entry in the table represents an editor instance. 它可以具有三个值之一。It can have one of three values. 如果它包含一个字符串，类型描述符将假设这是对象的类型，然后加载该类型的完全限定的名称。If it contains a string, the type descriptor will assume this is a fully qualified name of a type, and then load the type for the object. 如果其包含类型，则将创建此类型的实例以获取编辑器。If it contains a type, an instance of this type will be created to obtain an editor. 最后中的值部分可能包含实际的编辑器实例。Finally, the value portion may contain an actual editor instance. 如果类型描述符解析为实例的编辑器，它将存储回供将来使用该表的实例。If the type descriptor resolves an editor to an instance, it will store the instance back into the table for future use.

summary.span: 为某个组件的单个实例添加类型描述提供程序。

span.span: Adds a type description provider for a single instance of a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加类型说明提供程序提供类型的组件的单个实例的信息。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for a single instance of a component. 如果此方法，该提供程序的添加提供程序将不调用方法，因为该实例已经存在。If a provider is added by this method, the provider's method will not be called because the instance already exists. 此方法不维护对该组件的硬引用，因此不会阻止该组件正在最后完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to the component, so it does not prevent the component from finalizing. 它是可以添加多个类型说明提供程序的相同类型或对象。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果发生这种情况，将以独占方式使用的第一个类型说明提供遇到提供类型信息。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由于类型信息提供程序存储堆栈中，添加的最后一个提供将第一个查询。Since type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行为能让和方法用于进行推送和弹出类型说明提供程序所需的特定方案。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，此方法调用方法`instance`参数。If successful, this method calls the method on the `instance` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的两个版本生成和不同作用域的结果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 采用的方法参数只影响该单个实例的指定的组件。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 与此相反，另一重载，它将采用参数，会影响该类型所描述的组件的所有实例。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 使用方法如果你需要从部分受信任代码调用。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

span.span: Adds a type description provider for a component class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法添加类型说明提供程序提供类型指定的类，派生的类中，以及这些类型的所有实例的信息。The method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for the specified class, derived classes, and all instances of these types. > [!NOTE] > `type`参数可以是任何类型，包括一个接口。The `type` parameter can be any type, including an interface. 例如，若要提供自定义类型和实例的所有组件的信息，应指定`typeof(IComponent)`。For example, to provide custom type and instance information for all components, you would specify `typeof(IComponent)`. 传递`typeof(object)`将调用提供程序提供所有类型的类型信息。Passing `typeof(object)` will call the provider to supply type information for all types. 此方法不维护对任何对象的硬引用，因此不会阻止对象正在最后完成。This method does not maintain a hard reference to any object, so it does not prevent objects from finalizing. 它是可以添加多个类型说明提供程序的相同类型或对象。It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object. 如果发生这种情况，将以独占方式使用的第一个类型说明提供遇到提供类型信息。If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively. 由于类型信息提供程序存储在堆栈中，添加的最后一个提供将第一个查询。Because type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried. 此行为能让和方法用于进行推送和弹出类型说明提供程序所需的特定方案。This behavior enables the and methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios. 如果成功，此方法调用方法`type`参数。If successful, this method calls the method on the `type` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的两个版本生成和不同作用域的结果。The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes. 采用的方法参数只影响该单个实例的指定的组件。The method that takes an parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified. 与此相反，另一重载，它将采用参数，会影响该类型所描述的组件的所有实例。In contrast, the other overload, which takes a parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type. 使用方法如果你需要从部分受信任代码调用。Use the method if you need to call from partially trusted code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个主和辅助对象之间的关联。The method creates an association between a primary and a secondary object. 一旦创建关联时，设计器或其他筛选机制可以添加到主对象的属性集路由到任一对象的属性。Once an association is created, a designer or other filtering mechanism can add properties that route to either object into the primary object's property set. 当针对主对象，进行属性调用将调用方法，以解决与其类型参数的实际对象实例。When a property invocation is made against the primary object, the method will be called to resolve the actual object instance that is related to its type parameter. A用于维护主要和辅助对象之间的关联; 因此，此方法不会阻止任一对象从已完成并通过垃圾回收回收。A is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的属性方法可能会从原始组件的源列表，请按扩展程序提供程序进行动态修改 ()，筛选服务 ()，和属性筛选器。The attributes returned by the method may be dynamically modified from the original component's source listing by extender providers (), filter services (), and attribute filters. 当你定义的自定义属性设置为`true`，必须重写属性以确保其唯一性。When you define a custom attribute with set to `true`, you must override the property to make it unique. 如果特性的所有实例都是唯一的重写返回特性的对象标识。If all instances of your attribute are unique, override to return the object identity of your attribute. 如果只有特性的一些实例是唯一的返回一个介于，将在这些情况下返回是否相等。If only some instances of your attribute are unique, return a value from that would return equality in those cases. 例如，有些属性禁用了用作唯一键的构造函数参数。For example, some attributes have a constructor parameter that acts as a unique key. 对于这些特性，返回从构造函数参数的值属性。For these attributes, return the value of the constructor parameter from the property. > [!NOTE] > 默认实现返回而不考虑的值的类型标识属性。The default implementation of returns the type identity regardless of the value of the property. 若要返回的多个实例属性从，特性必须重写属性。In order to return multiple instances of an attribute from the , your attribute must override the property. ## Examples 此方法的示例，请参阅方法。For an example of this method, see the method.

summary.span: 从缓存中清除指定组件的属性和事件。

span.span: Clears the properties and events for the specified component from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过缓存属性和事件的速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果他们这样做，它们应调用此方法以清除该对象的属性和事件描述符。If they do, they should call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 在运行时不使用它。It is not used during run time. 此方法也会引发事件的属性或事件的组件更改时。This method also raises a event when the properties or events of a component change. 如果没有调用仅将引发此事件或缓存信息的方法。This event is only raised if there was a prior call to the or method that cached the information. ## Examples 使用此方法的示例，请参阅类。For an example of using this method, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过缓存属性和事件的速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果他们这样做，它们可以调用此方法以清除该对象的属性和事件描述符。If they do, they can call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 在运行时不使用它。It is not used during run time. 在进行调用之前方法来清除缓存中，你需要调用要首先缓存该信息的特定程序集的方法。Before you make a call to the method to clear the cache, you need to call the method for the specific assembly to cache the information first. 此方法也会引发事件来通知想要将属性设置的组件更改通知的所有类。This method also raises a event to notify all classes that want to be notified when the property set of a component changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过缓存属性和事件的速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果他们这样做，它们可以调用此方法以清除该对象的属性和事件描述符。If they do, they can call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 在运行时不使用它。It is not used during run time. 在进行调用之前方法来清除缓存中，你需要调用为特定的模块，以首先缓存信息的方法。Before you make a call to the method to clear the cache, you need to call the method for the specific module to cache the information first. 此方法也会引发事件来通知想要将属性设置的组件更改通知的所有类。This method also raises a event to notify all classes that want to be notified when the property set of a component changes.

summary.span: 从缓存中清除指定类型的组件的属性和事件。

span.span: Clears the properties and events for the specified type of component from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当没有对象的实例时，请调用此方法的此版本。Call this version of this method only when you do not have an instance of the object. 通过缓存属性和事件的速度。Properties and events are cached by for speed. 通常情况下，它们是常量对象的生存期内。Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object. 但是，扩展程序提供程序和设计器可以更改对象上的属性的集。However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object. 如果他们这样做，它们可以调用此方法以清除该对象的属性和事件描述符。If they do, they can call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object. 此方法仅在设计时使用。This method is used only at design time. 在运行时不使用它。It is not used during run time. 此方法也会引发事件的属性或事件的组件更改时。This method also raises a event when the properties or events of a component change. 如果没有调用仅将引发此事件或缓存信息的方法。This event is only raised if there was a prior call to the or method that cached the information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法删除由构成的两个对象之间的关联方法。The method removes an association between two objects formed by the method. A用于维护主要和辅助对象之间的关联; 因此，此方法不会影响时终止或通过垃圾回收回收可能是对象。A is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not influence when either object is finalized or reclaimed by garbage collection.
